title: RELEASE: Gary Vee DEBUTS VeeFriends NFTs!
description:
Gary Vaynerchuk (aka GaryVee), serial entrepreneur and Chairman of VaynerX, today released his first NFT collection called VeeFriends.

VeeFriends:
https://www.veefriends.com/
